GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles together with a count of all comments for each article, and sorted by most recent article; does not contain the actual body of any article

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article object corresponding to the provided article_id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all the comments corresponding to the provided article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment to the article corresponding to the provided article_id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates an article corresponding to the provided article_id by increasing or decreasing the number of votes for the article

DELETE /api/comments/:comments_id.description: deletes a comment corresponding to the provided comment_id

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
